title: Best of The Program | Guests: Bill O'Reilly & Dr. Robin Armstrong | 4/17/20
description:
In today’s coronavirus update, China revises Wuhan’s death rate UP, the White House releases reopening guidelines, and wholesale gas prices are WAY down! Bill O’Reilly brings his biggest stories of the week: dictator-governors, reopening the economy, and the northeast’s plan to “Trump-proof” it. The media still slams hydroxychloroquine, but Dr. Robin Armstrong describes the great results he’s seen with his patients. And the drug’s actual history may surprise you.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
